name: elini
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: mpbir2an(c0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wcel(c0, c2)
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wcel(c0, c1)
-| wcel(c0, c2)

comment: Membership in an intersection of two classes. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
